plot: Leslie discovers that a newspaper reporter has hacked her e-mail account, Ben begins his new job, and Ann decides that she wants Chris to be her sperm donor.

After an obnoxious newspaper reporter steals Leslie's jokes at the Pawnee Correspondents' dinner, Leslie's improvised jokes crash and burn. Meanwhile, Ann asks Chris to be her sperm donor, and Ben hires a depressed Andy to work for Sweetums Foundation.
